CUDA Kernels API ReferenceÔÉÅ

This module provides CUDA-accelerated functions for trajectory planning and dynamics computation with automatic CPU fallback.

Environment VariablesÔÉÅ

MANIPULAPY_FASTMATH

Set to ‚Äú1‚Äù to enable fast math optimizations (~2x speedup with relaxed IEEE 754 compliance)

MANIPULAPY_USE_FP16

Set to ‚Äú1‚Äù to use 16-bit floating point precision for memory-bound kernels
